title: ‘Heart Broken’: Jay Vine Devastated but Undamaged after Crash Costs Medal Chances at TT Worlds
content:
'Silly mistake on a non-technical section of the course cost me': Vine shares update after receiving stitches following brutal, bloody crash in Zürich.

Read the full article at ‘Heart Broken’: Jay Vine Devastated but Undamaged after Crash Costs Medal Chances at TT Worlds on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
